ru.atomation.jbrowser.interfaces

Interface BrowserWindowCreator

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.mozilla.interfaces.nsISupports, org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIWindowCreator
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractBrowserWindowCreator, JBrowserWindowCreator

    public interface BrowserWindowCreator
extends org.mozilla.interfaces.nsIWindowCreator
    Interface to process callback`s when mozilla needs to open window
    Author:
    caiiiycuk

                                                      long flags)

      • attachBrowser

        void attachBrowser(JBrowserComponent<?> browser,
                 long chromeFlags)
        Creates a mozilla browser and adds it into a Swing window. The Swing window must be already created and realized!! (i.e. after addNotify())

      • detachBrowser

        void detachBrowser(JBrowserComponent<?> browser)
        Remove mozilla browser from Swing window, and then destroys the browser. The Swing window will continue to exist.

      • setBrowserFactory

        void setBrowserFactory(ComponentFacotry<?> factory)
        Parameters:
        factory - set factory to produce new browser, rememver that factory must produce dispalable windows, else you will have deadlocks

      • getBrowserFactory

        ComponentFacotry<?> getBrowserFactory()
        Returns:
        get factory to produce new browser, rememver that factory must produce dispalable windows, else you will have deadlocks
